p: This data set included 209 sequences of CRF55_01B strains from various risk groups: heterosexuals (Hetero, n = 27), injecting drug users (IDUs, n = 1), MSM ( n = 169), and unknown risk (n/a, n = 12). The samples are obtained from 7 Chinese provinces: Anhui ( n = 2), Guangdong ( n = 166), Guangxi ( n = 8), Hebei ( n = 10), Hunan ( n = 2), Shanghai ( n = 18), and Zhejiang ( n = 3), with sampling years between 2007 and 2015 (Table 1 and Supplementary Table S1). The main risk groups were MSM (80.86%) and Hetero (12.92%). The samples were primarily from Guangdong (79.43%) and Shanghai (8.6%).
